40  #region Basic Item Drawers
41 
52  public static T DefaultItemDrawer<T>(Rect position, T item) {
53  GUI.Label(position, "Item drawer not implemented.");
54  return item;
55  }
56 
68  public static string TextFieldItemDrawer(Rect position, string item) {
69  if (item == null) {
70  item = "";
71  GUI.changed = true;
72  }
73  return EditorGUI.TextField(position, item);
74  }
75 
76  #endregion
77 
81  private static ReorderableListControl defaultListControl { get; set; }
82 
83  static ReorderableListGUI() {
84  InitStyles();
85 
86  defaultListControl = new ReorderableListControl();
87 
88  // Duplicate default styles to prevent user scripts from interferring with the default
89  // list control instance.
90  defaultListControl.containerStyle = new GUIStyle(defaultContainerStyle);
91  defaultListControl.addButtonStyle = new GUIStyle(defaultAddButtonStyle);
92  defaultListControl.removeButtonStyle = new GUIStyle(defaultRemoveButtonStyle);
93 
94  indexOfChangedItem = -1;
95  }
96 
97  #region Custom Styles
98 
102  public static GUIStyle defaultTitleStyle { get; private set; }
103 
107  public static GUIStyle defaultContainerStyle { get; private set; }
111  public static GUIStyle defaultAddButtonStyle { get; private set; }
115  public static GUIStyle defaultRemoveButtonStyle { get; private set; }
116 
117  private static void InitStyles() {
118  defaultTitleStyle = new GUIStyle();
119  defaultTitleStyle.border = new RectOffset(2, 2, 2, 1);
120  defaultTitleStyle.margin = new RectOffset(5, 5, 5, 0);
121  defaultTitleStyle.padding = new RectOffset(5, 5, 0, 0);
122  defaultTitleStyle.alignment = TextAnchor.MiddleLeft;
123  defaultTitleStyle.normal.background = ReorderableListResources.texTitleBackground;
124  defaultTitleStyle.normal.textColor = EditorGUIUtility.isProSkin
125  ? new Color(0.8f, 0.8f, 0.8f)
126  : new Color(0.2f, 0.2f, 0.2f);
127 
128  defaultContainerStyle = new GUIStyle();
129  defaultContainerStyle.border = new RectOffset(2, 2, 1, 2);
130  defaultContainerStyle.margin = new RectOffset(5, 5, 5, 5);
131  defaultContainerStyle.padding = new RectOffset(1, 1, 2, 2);
132  defaultContainerStyle.normal.background = ReorderableListResources.texContainerBackground;
133 
134  defaultAddButtonStyle = new GUIStyle();
135  defaultAddButtonStyle.fixedWidth = 30;
136  defaultAddButtonStyle.fixedHeight = 16;
137  defaultAddButtonStyle.normal.background = ReorderableListResources.texAddButton;
138  defaultAddButtonStyle.active.background = ReorderableListResources.texAddButtonActive;
139 
140  defaultRemoveButtonStyle = new GUIStyle();
141  defaultRemoveButtonStyle.fixedWidth = 27;
142  defaultRemoveButtonStyle.active.background = ReorderableListResources.CreatePixelTexture("Dark Pixel (List GUI)", new Color32(18, 18, 18, 255));
143  defaultRemoveButtonStyle.imagePosition = ImagePosition.ImageOnly;
144  defaultRemoveButtonStyle.alignment = TextAnchor.MiddleCenter;
145 
146  }
147 
148  #endregion
149 
150  private static GUIContent s_Temp = new GUIContent();
151 
152  #region Title Control
153 
164  public static void Title(GUIContent title) {
165  Rect position = GUILayoutUtility.GetRect(title, defaultTitleStyle);
166  position.height += 6;
167  Title(position, title);
168  }
169 
170  public static float CalculateTitleHeight() {
171  return defaultTitleStyle.CalcHeight(GUIContent.none, 100) + 6;
172  }
173 
184  public static void Title(string title) {
185  s_Temp.text = title;
186  Title(s_Temp);
187  }
188 
194  public static void Title(Rect position, GUIContent title) {
195  if (Event.current.type == EventType.Repaint)
196  defaultTitleStyle.Draw(position, title, false, false, false, false);
197  }
198 
204  public static void Title(Rect position, string text) {
205  s_Temp.text = text;
206  Title(position, s_Temp);
207  }
208 
209  #endregion

223  private static void DoListField<T>(IList<T> list, ReorderableListControl.ItemDrawer<T> drawItem, ReorderableListControl.DrawEmpty drawEmpty, float itemHeight, ReorderableListFlags flags) {
224  var adaptor = new GenericListAdaptor<T>(list, drawItem, itemHeight);
225  ReorderableListControl.DrawControlFromState(adaptor, drawEmpty, flags);
226  }
238  private static void DoListFieldAbsolute<T>(Rect position, IList<T> list, ReorderableListControl.ItemDrawer<T> drawItem, ReorderableListControl.DrawEmptyAbsolute drawEmpty, float itemHeight, ReorderableListFlags flags) {
239  var adaptor = new GenericListAdaptor<T>(list, drawItem, itemHeight);
240  ReorderableListControl.DrawControlFromState(position, adaptor, drawEmpty, flags);
241  }

314 
322  public static float CalculateListFieldHeight(int itemCount, float itemHeight, ReorderableListFlags flags) {
323  // We need to push/pop flags so that nested controls are properly calculated.
324  var restoreFlags = defaultListControl.flags;
325  try {
326  defaultListControl.flags = flags;
327  return defaultListControl.CalculateListHeight(itemCount, itemHeight);
328  }
329  finally {
330  defaultListControl.flags = restoreFlags;
331  }
332  }
333 
335  public static float CalculateListFieldHeight(int itemCount, ReorderableListFlags flags) {
336  return CalculateListFieldHeight(itemCount, DefaultItemHeight, flags);
337  }
339  public static float CalculateListFieldHeight(int itemCount, float itemHeight) {
340  return CalculateListFieldHeight(itemCount, itemHeight, 0);
341  }
343  public static float CalculateListFieldHeight(int itemCount) {
344  return CalculateListFieldHeight(itemCount, DefaultItemHeight, 0);
345  }

363  }

414 
421  public static float CalculateListFieldHeight(SerializedProperty arrayProperty, ReorderableListFlags flags) {
422  // We need to push/pop flags so that nested controls are properly calculated.
423  var restoreFlags = defaultListControl.flags;
424  try {
425  defaultListControl.flags = flags;
426  return defaultListControl.CalculateListHeight(new SerializedPropertyAdaptor(arrayProperty));
427  }
428  finally {
429  defaultListControl.flags = restoreFlags;
430  }
431  }
432 
434  public static float CalculateListFieldHeight(SerializedProperty arrayProperty) {
435  return CalculateListFieldHeight(arrayProperty, 0);
436  }
437

546  public static float CalculateListFieldHeight(IReorderableListAdaptor adaptor, ReorderableListFlags flags) {
547  // We need to push/pop flags so that nested controls are properly calculated.
548  var restoreFlags = defaultListControl.flags;
549  try {
550  defaultListControl.flags = flags;
551  return defaultListControl.CalculateListHeight(adaptor);
552  }
553  finally {
554  defaultListControl.flags = restoreFlags;
555  }
556  }
557 
561  public static float CalculateListFieldHeight(IReorderableListAdaptor adaptor) {
562  return CalculateListFieldHeight(adaptor, 0);
563  }

FullInspector.Rotorz.ReorderableList.ReorderableListFlags
ReorderableListFlags
Additional flags which can be passed into reorderable list field.
